Carbon Footprint Tracker

• Single-file HTML app with inline CSS and JavaScript; no external libraries or dependencies.

• Core Features:
  - Add and log daily activities (transportation, energy use, shopping) with carbon impact estimates (kg CO2).
  - Display running total carbon footprint for the current week, month, and all-time.
  - Drag-and-drop interface to reorder or delete logged activities.
  - Offline-first: all data persists to localStorage; app works without internet.
  - Dark/light theme that auto-detects system preference and toggles manually.
  - Export weekly summary as plain text (copy to clipboard).

• Data Structure:
  - Each activity: timestamp, category, description, estimated CO2 (kg).
  - Store in localStorage as JSON array; auto-load on page refresh.

• UI/UX:
  - Input form with category dropdown (Car, Bus, Flight, Electricity, Food, Shopping, Other).
  - Activity list showing date, category icon, description, and CO2 value.
  - Draggable items for reordering; swipe or click to delete.
  - Summary cards showing weekly, monthly, and lifetime totals.
  - Toggle button for theme (top-right corner).
  - Responsive design: works on mobile, tablet, desktop.

• Accessibility:
  - Keyboard navigation: Tab through form fields, Enter to submit, Delete key to remove items.
  - ARIA labels and semantic HTML.
  - High-contrast text in both themes.

• Optional Polish:
  - Visual progress bar toward a weekly CO2 reduction goal (user-set).
  - Trend indicator (up/down arrow) comparing this week to last week.
